& hi swa dydon.
WSCp MARK 8.7 And hi næfdon buton feawa fixa,
& he þa bletsode, & het beforan him settan.
WSCp MARK 8.8 & hi æton & wurdon gefyllede;
& hi namon þæt of þam brytsenum belaf seofon wilian fulle.
WSCp MARK 8.9 Soðlice þa ðe þar æton wæron fif þusend;
& he hi þa forlet.
WSCp MARK 8.10 And sona he on scyp mid his leorningcnihtum astah, & com on þa dælas Dalmanuða.
WSCp MARK 8.11 And þa ferdon ða Pharisei, & ongunnon mid him smeagean, & tacen of heofone sohton & his fandedon.
WSCp MARK 8.12 Þa cwæð he geomriende on his gaste,
hwi secð þeos cneoris tacen;
Soþlice ic eow secge,
ne bið þisse cneorisse tacen geseald.
WSCp MARK 8.13 & hi þa forlætende eft on scyp astah, & ferde ofer þone muðan.
WSCp MARK 8.14 & hi ofergeton þæt hi hlafas ne namon,
& hi næfdon on scype mid him buton ænne hlaf.
WSCp MARK 8.15 & he him bead & cwæð,
lociað & warniað fram Pharisea & Herodes hæfe.
WSCp MARK 8.16 Þa þohton hi betwux him & cwædon,
næbbe we nane hlafas.
WSCp MARK 8.17 Þa se hælend þæt wiste he cwæð,
hwæt þence ge forþam ge hlafas nabbað;
Gyt ge ne oncnawað ne ne ongytað;
Gyt ge habbað eowre heortan geblende?
WSCp MARK 8.18 Eagan ge habbað & ne geseoð, & earan & ne gehyrað;
Ne ge ne þencaþ.
WSCp MARK 8.19 Hwænne ic bræc fif hlafas & twegen fixas & hu fela wyligena ge namon fulle;
Hi cwædon, þa
twelfe.
WSCp MARK 8.20 And hwænne seofon hlafas feower þusendum & hu fela wyligena brytsyna ge namon;
Hi sædon,
seofon.
WSCp MARK 8.21 Ða sæde he him,
hwi ne ongyte ge gyt?
WSCp MARK 8.22 And hi comon þa to Bedzaida,
& hi brohton him þa ænne blindne, & hine bædon þæt he hine æthrine.
WSCp MARK 8.23 & þa æthran he þæs blindan hand, & lædde hine butan þa wic; & spætte on his eagan, & his hand onasette, & hine axode hwæþer he aht gesawe.
WSCp MARK 8.24 Ða cwæð he þa ða he hine beseah;
Ic geseo men swylce treow gangende.
WSCp MARK 8.25 Eft he asette his handa ofer his eagan
& he geseah þa, & wearð geedniwod, swa þæt he beorhtlice eall geseah.
WSCp MARK 8.26 Ða sende he hine to his huse & cwæð,
ga to þinum huse,
& ðeah þu on tun ga nænegum þu hit ne sege.
WSCp MARK 8.27 Ða eode he & his leorningcnihtas on þæt castel Cesareæ Philippi;
& he on wege his leorningcnihtas ahsode,
hwæt secgað men þæt ic sy?
WSCp MARK 8.28 Þa andswarodon hi,
sume Iohannem þone Fulluhtere,
sume Heliam,
sume sumne of þam witegum.
WSCp MARK 8.29 Ða cwæð he,
hwæt secge ge þæt ic sy;
þa andswarude Petrus him & cwæð,
ðu eart Crist.
WSCp MARK 8.30 & ða bead he him þæt hi nænegum be him ne sædon.

WSCp MARK 8.31 Ða ongan he hi læran þæt mannes sunu gebyreð fela þinga þolian & beon aworpen fram ealdormannum & heahsacerdum & bocerum & beon ofslegen & æfter þrim dagum arisan. WSCp MARK 8.32 & spræc þa openlice;
& þa nam Petrus hine, & ongan hine þreagean.
WSCp MARK 8.33 Þa bewende he hine & cidde Petre & cwæð,
ga onbæc Satanas
forþam þu nast þa ðing þe synd Godes ac þa ðing þe synd manna.
WSCp MARK 8.34 Þa cwæð he togædere geclypedre menegu mid his leorningcnihtum,
gif hwa wyle me fyligean, wiðsace hine sylfne & nime his cwylminge & folgige me.
WSCp MARK 8.35 Se ðe wyle his sawle hale gedon, se hi forspilð;
Se ðe forspilð his sawle for me & for þam godspelle se hi gehælð.
WSCp MARK 8.36 Hwæt fremað men ðeah he eallne middaneard gestryne & do his sawle forwyrd?
WSCp MARK 8.37 Oþþe hwylc gewryxl sylð se man for his sawle?
WSCp MARK 8.38 Soðlice se þe me forsyhð & mine word on þisre unrihthæmedan & synfulran cneorisse, ðone mannes sunu forsyhþ ðonne he cymð on his Fæder wuldre mid halgum englum.
WSCp MARK 9.1 Þa sæde he him
soðlice, ic secge eow þæt syme synt her wuniende þe deað ne onbyrigeað ær hi geseon Godes rice on mægne cuman.
WSCp MARK 9.2 Ða æfter syx dagum nam se hælend Petrum & Iacobum & Iohannem & lædde hi sylfe onsundran on sumne heahne munt & wearð beforan him oferhiwud.
WSCp MARK 9.3 & his reaf wurdon glitiniende swa hwite swa snaw swa nan fullere ofer eorðan ne mæg swa hwite gedon.
WSCp MARK 9.4 Þa ætywde him Helias mid Moyse & to him spræcon.
